forecast.day_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow. The snow could be heavy at times.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 7. Windy, with a southwest wind around 30 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 30 percent chance of snow before 7am. The snow could be heavy at times.  Mostly sunny, with a high near 14. Blustery, with a north wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.  New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
